details.description: Find your local Jobcentre Plus, make a new or repeat benefit claim over the phone, search for a job over the phone
details.body:
Find your local office, get help finding a job, report a change in your circumstances or change a Jobcentre Plus appointment.

Contact your Jobcentre Plus office or phone the Jobcentre Plus helplines listed below.

Benefits advice

Use benefits adviser to find out what benefits you may be entitled to.

Benefit claims

Telephone: 0800 055 6688
Textphone: 0800 023 4888
Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm

Jobcentre Plus appointments

Cancel or change an appointment

Telephone: 0845 604 3719
Textphone: 0845 608 8551
Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm

Find a job

Use the Jobcentre Plus job search to find a job. You can also use the Jobcentre Plus phone service.

Jobcentre Plus phone service

Telephone: 0845 6060 234
Textphone: 0845 6055 255
Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm

You can apply for a National Insurance number or find out your number if youâ€™ve lost it.

details.description: Includes job search, volunteering, apprenticeships and job offers
Includes holidays and finding a job

tags.title: Jobseeker's Allowance and low income benefits

details.description: Includes Income Support and Disability Living Allowance
Budgeting loans can help to pay for essential everyday costs - what you'll get, eligibility and apply
Crisis Loans can help with costs after an emergency or disaster - what you'll get, eligibility, apply
If you're getting certain benefits, you may be able to get a Cold Weather Payment - what you'll get, eligibility and how to find out if your area has received a payment
How to apply for a National Insurance number for the first time
